ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the user can only progress to ready for use when the end date is not in the past.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Ready For Use"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c), "Ready For Use")), End_Date__c <= TODAY() )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: End Date cannot be in the past.
